text: Hi <@UNU1C7MA7>, yes we are using inline CSS and I tested it out on Gmail / Gmail mobile app and the styles are working.
Wow. To me is not working. Can you share some code?
It works on the email preview off course, but gmail strips all style tags. And the inliner can’t handle queries so...

<@UNU1C7MA7> No worries, was just working on the email actually. Yeah, we don't have any hover styles. The basic table layout, margin, and padding, background, color are all working. But I just found out the shadows are not working.
